Text:
Appearently TPB doesnt allow me to post my podcast url link so you could pre-listen my releases.

So if you dont the link, just download the MediaInfo.nfo file and open it with notepad or a nfo viewer and you`ll find the link there.

Greetzzzzz

thank 4 d music m8! nice work as usual; but with all due respect @ times @ TPB it is difficult to find trance music @ 320kbps. could u help me with some other sites where we could get high qaul. mp3 trance music??!! anyways thanks again m8...!!
